DependenciesÂ¶

These are the dependencies and the specific version numbers that I am working on, to aid in debugging and development should version problems arise.

  • Python 3.3.2
  • findutils 4.4.2
  • fuse 2.9.2

For the documentation:

  • Sphinx==1.1.3

You will also need a custom ctags extension for Sphinx: ext_ctags

Place ext_ctags.py in sphinx/ext wherever Sphinx is installed for your environment. Otherwise, you will need to remove the extension from doc/config.py to prevent errors.
